about_the_game:
If you find it hard to play, you can see in for more information and contact me

You wake up from a deep sleep with a terrible headache, and you see the dark, empty subterranean base.

You are saved by a traveler, from whom you learn that the world has experienced a disaster later called 'The Holy Silence'. The sun suddenly disappeared, the world became dark, and the creatures and environment have changed beyond understanding.

Five races were born in the world, and humans became the common target of the new races. The combined strangling of 'The Holy Silence' and the five races made mankind retreat successively, and finally retreated to the underground base in order to survive.

Without memory, you embark on a journey of discovery, both to save the world and to save yourself...

Game features:
1. To overcome the darkness using your wisdom, courage and technology.

2. Randomly generated maps and more than 100 enemies.

3. 10 different weapons,5 elements,7 enhancements, up to hundreds of combat methods in any combination. Each weapon has unique ultimage attack.

4. Enemies have different skills and powerful properties, 5 Races have their own unique ecology and identity. Study them carefully and choose the right way to fight.

5. Play your own game. You can be an assassin who kills enemy without seeing, or a brave warrior, or a warrior who is both smart and brave... It's up to you to write your legend.

6. Four kinds of disastrous weather (Evil Wind, Red Moon, Blood Rain, Miasma), and six kinds of terrain (grass, pond, ocean, trees, obstacles, roads). Make the most of your environment to fight.

7 Develop your strategy. Your base needs to survive and each race needs to explore. Allocate your resources wisely.

8. Enemies grow stronger as you explore, and carefully decide which races to explore each time.

short_description: A Roguelike action adventure shoot game that creates your legendary experience. In the dark and wide world, explore the five races and the causes of the world's cataclysm. Flexible to deal with the complex and changing world environment with different weapons, technology and elements.
